events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after review of the incident details and keywords.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage this auto accident claim for further processing.
Acknowledgment message sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimate from the customer.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos and official police report.
Investigation commenced to verify the authenticity of the accident and review the submitted evidence.
Investigation verified all claims were valid; vehicle damage assessment completed successfully.
A settlement offer was made to the customer covering the estimated repair costs of the vehicle.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed appreciation for prompt handling.
The claim was officially approved following the customer’s acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment for the vehicle repairs was issued to the customer’s account as per the approved claim settlement.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed after full payment and customer confirmation.
